post.body: This is even better than facebook.

This is something I wondered earlier. Kind of brainfucked me. If you are asking yourself "It's just gotta be physically impossible to use without an internet connection." Technically you are both right and wrong. You can download updates to the pages you enjoy and use online. You can still browse the websites you already downloaded when offline. Hope that helps some people out!
